about_the_game: Bishojo Battlefield is the first battlefield experience mobile game developed by our studio. The ultimate audio-visual experience, various maps, real ballistics, cool blasts, and perfect shooting feel will bring you a different shooting experience. In order to seize more battlefield in the game, you need to learn to shoot, but also learn to ride a horse and shoot arrows, drive a tank, wield a sword and dance a spear, and confront the enemy through superior combat strategy and agile operation to win the war. The game features a: ancient and modern confrontation, you can experience the peak of cold weapons and hot weapons duel; feature two: sandbox mode, the game play self-set; feature three: 100 people battlefield, secondary moe girls, knights, archers, special forces and other characters to fight alongside or against you. Feature four: weapon diversification, each weapon can be unique. If you like our game, hurry up and download the trial game ~

short_description: A funny shooting game where you can customize the gameplay, such as zombies holding submachine guns and shooting aliens, or wolf dogs holding samurai swords and fighting special forces in close combat... How unexpected the settings will be depends on your imagination.
